lyrics: Silent nightHoly nightI'm dreamingI'm longing for youもうすぐ　この街に雪が降るjingle bell鳴り響く夜I wish you a merry christmas!La La La merry christmas!願いがひとつ　叶いますようにI wish you a white christmas!La La La merry christmas!あなたと二人で奏でようメロディSilent nightHoly nighthold me tightI'm longing for you街中　優しい光包まれてshining star煌めく　christmas treeI wish you a merry christmas!La La La merry christmas!二人の想い　解け合いますようにI wish you a white christmas!La La La merry christmas!あなたと幸せになれますようにI wish you a merry christmas!La La La merry christmas!願いがひとつ　叶いますようにI wish you a white christmas!La La La merry christmas!あなたと一緒に奏でるメロディI wish you a merry christmas!La La La merry christmas!二人の想い　解け合いますようにI wish you a white christmas!La La La merry christmas!世界中 幸せになるように雪に願いを
translated_lyrics: Silent nighttime I'm dreamingI'm longing, longing for you, and a jingle bell that snows in this city soon, I wish you a merry christmas! La La merry christmas!I wish you one wish, I wish you a white christmas! La La merry christmas!Melody Silent nightingency nighthold for you and two people to play with you, it's a nice light, a longing, longing for you town, and a shristmentreeI wish you a merry christmas! La La merry christmas!As for the two thoughts, I wish you a wish you a white christmas! La La merry christmas!To be happy with you, I wish you wish you a merry christmas! La La merry christmas!I wish you one wish, I wish you a white christmas! La La merry christmas!Melody I wish you to play with you, I wish you a merry christmas! La La merry christmas!As for the two thoughts, I wish you a wish you a white christmas! La La merry christmas!Make a wish of snow to be happy all over the world.
